mapper.select: SELECT t.`id`,'1' AS `type`,t.`organization_id` AS organizationId,t.`parent_organization_id` AS parentOrganizationId FROM `credit_product` t WHERE t.`status`=1 UNION ALL SELECT t.`id`,'2' AS `type`,t.`organization_id` AS organizationId,t.`parent_organization_id` AS parentOrganizationId FROM `finance_product` t WHERE t.`status`=1
